description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes and layouts of a React application. It defines colors for light and dark themes, styles for various components including headers, buttons, and responsive design features.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container with center-aligned content, background color determined by the applied theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: The header section for the application, styled to fill the viewport height and center its contents.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, changing color based on the defined theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, styled with transitions and shadows for interactive effects.
